text: Colobopsis is a genus of ant in the subfamily Formicinae. This genus was first described in 1861 by Mayr and contains 95 species. The type species is Colobopsis truncata. ==Species== Selected species: *Colobopsis abdita *Colobopsis anderseni *Colobopsis ceylonica *Colobopsis explodens *Colobopsis saundersi *Colobopsis schmitzi *Colobopsis truncata ==References== Category:Formicinae Category:Ant genera
title: Colobopsis
